files.Title: AlphaFramework.Editor
files.Summary:
Toolkit for creating IDE-like editors for games based on OmegaEngine and AlphaFramework. You can use it to create GUI dialogs, maps, particle systems, etc. for your game.

files.Title: FrameOfReference

Frame of Reference is the official sample game for the OmegaEngine.
It is intended as a sample/reference for developers working on other games.

files.Title: OmegaEngine.Graphics.SpecialView
files.Summary: A common base class for views that use non-standard rendering modes.

files.Title: OmegaEngine.Graphics.SupportView
files.Summary: A common base class for all that provide support functionality like water refraction/reflection, glow maps, etc.

files.Title: OmegaEngine.Graphics.TextureView
files.Summary: A special kind of that directs its output into a texture instead of printing straight to the screen.

files.Title: OmegaEngine.Graphics.TexturedMesh
files.Summary: Methods for creating meshes of simple geometric shapes (box, sphere, etc.) with texture coordinates.

files.Title: OmegaEngine.Graphics.TexturedMeshUtils
files.Summary: Utility method for textured es.

files.Title: OmegaEngine.Graphics.VertexDecl.PositionColored
files.Summary: A fixed-function vertex format that stores position and color. Using this format hints the engine that that no lighting is to be used.

files.Title: OmegaEngine.Graphics.VertexDecl.PositionColoredTextured
files.Summary: Not supported!

files.Title: OmegaEngine.Graphics.VertexDecl.PositionMultiTextured
files.Summary: A fixed-function vertex format that stores position, shadow information, texture blending weights and texture coordinates. Using this format hints the engine that normals and tangents still need to be calculated.

files.Title: OmegaEngine.Graphics.VertexDecl.PositionNormalBinormalTangentTextured
files.Summary: A fixed-function vertex format that stores position, normals, binormals, tangents and texture coordinates. Using this format hints the engine that all necessary data is already present.

files.Title: OmegaEngine.Graphics.VertexDecl.PositionNormalColored
files.Summary: A fixed-function vertex format that stores position, normals and color. Using this format hints the engine that that lighting is to be used.

files.Title: OmegaEngine.Graphics.VertexDecl.PositionNormalMultiTextured
files.Summary: A custom vertex format that stores position, normals, shadow information, texture blending weights and texture coordinates. Using this format hints the engine that tangents (and maybe normals) still need to be calculated.

files.Title: OmegaEngine.Graphics.VertexDecl.PositionNormalTextured
files.Summary: A fixed-function vertex format that stores position, normals and texture coordinates. Using this format hints the engine that tangents (and maybe normals) still need to be calculated.

files.Title: OmegaEngine.Graphics.VertexDecl.PositionTextured
files.Summary: A fixed-function vertex format that stores position and texture coordinates. Using this format hints the engine that normals and tangents still need to be calculated.

files.Title: OmegaEngine.Graphics.VertexDecl.TransformedColored
files.Summary: A fixed-function vertex format that stores a transformed position and color.

files.Title: OmegaEngine.Graphics.VertexDecl.TransformedColoredTextured
files.Summary: A fixed-function vertex format that stores a transformed position, color and texture coordinates.

files.Title: OmegaEngine.Graphics.VertexDecl.TransformedTextured
files.Summary: A fixed-function vertex format that stores a transformed position and texture coordinates.

files.Title: OmegaEngine.Graphics.VertexDecl
files.Summary: Structs mapped to DirectX custom vertex formats (for storing additional information per vertex).

files.Title: OmegaEngine.Graphics.View
files.Summary: Controls the rendering of a using a .

files.Title: OmegaEngine.Graphics.WaterView
files.Summary: A for rendering refractions or reflections

files.Title: OmegaEngine.Graphics.XMaterial
files.Summary: A combination of textures and lighting parameters.

files.Title: OmegaEngine.Graphics
files.Summary: Graphics subsystem of the engine.

files.Title: OmegaEngine.Hardware
files.Summary: Information about the hardware the is running on.

files.Title: OmegaEngine.IAudio
files.Summary: Represents an asset that can playback audio.

files.Title: OmegaEngine.IPositionable
files.Summary: An interface to objects that have a position.

files.Title: OmegaEngine.Input.IInputReceiver
files.Summary: An object that receives input procesed into navigational commands from an .

files.Title: OmegaEngine.Input.InputProvider
files.Summary: Processes events from an input device into higher-level navigational commands.

files.Title: OmegaEngine.Input.KeyboardInputProvider
files.Summary: Processes keyboard events into higher-level navigational commands.

files.Title: OmegaEngine.Input.MouseInputProvider
files.Summary: Processes mouse events into higher-level navigational commands.

files.Title: OmegaEngine.Input.TouchInputProvider
files.Summary: Processes touch events into higher-level navigational commands.

files.Title: OmegaEngine.Input.UpdateReceiver
files.Summary: Calls a callback delegate whenever any kind of input is received.

files.Title: OmegaEngine.Input
files.Summary: Handlers for mouse, keyboard and touch input.

files.Title: OmegaEngine.Profiler
files.Summary: Helper class with static functions to signal the beginnings and endings of performance profiling events. In Debug builds events are also passed to PIX.

files.Title: OmegaEngine.ProfilerEvent
files.Summary: Struct that allows you to profile timed execution blocks.

files.Title: OmegaEngine.RenderHost.RenderForm
files.Summary: An internal Windows Form to use as render target with mouse+keyboard event handling

files.Title: OmegaEngine.RenderHost
files.Summary: Automatically provides an instance with a fullscreen-capable window, render loop, input handling, etc.

files.Title: OmegaEngine.RenderPanel
files.Summary: A that automatically provides an instance for rendering on it, an optional timer-driver render loop, input handling, etc.

files.Title: OmegaEngine
files.Summary:
3D graphics rendering based on DirectX 9.

files.Title: OmegaGUI
files.Summary:
OmegaGUI is a GUI toolkit for OmegaEngine. It has an XML file format for describing UIs ( provides a WYSIWYG editor). It uses Lua scripting for event handling.

NuGet package: OmegaGUI
